item.title: Live Updates: At Least 39 Are Dead in High-Speed Train Crash in Spain
item.description: Rescuers were working to retrieve bodies from the wreckage after two trains derailed in southern Spain. The cause of the train crash, the deadliest in...

item.title: What We Know About the Deadly High-Speed Train Crash in Spain
item.description: Sunday’s train crash in the southern region of Andalucía was the deadliest in Spain since at least 2013.

item.title: Spain Closes High-Speed Rail Network in South After Crash
item.description: The closures were announced after a high-speed train derailed and smashed into another high-speed train, killing at least 39 people and injuring dozen...

item.title: Survivors of Deadly Train Crash in Spain Describe Hellish Scenes
item.description: Photographs show a tangled mess of metal, wires and broken glass at the scene of the crash, which killed at least 39 people.
